page.title: 09THE SHOPPING HIERARCHY
page.content: Of 14{neighbourhood shopping centres in Crawley 8 (+ part of 1) are in this block. Provision is fairly uniform in size, range and layout. A count shows we don't have the 2 biggest, and that ours are classed as{large:-}Gales Dr (3 Bridges), Tilgate Pl, Ifield Dr, Southgate Pde;{small:-}Gossops Pde, Dorsten Sq (Bewbush), old West Gn; {local:-}Ewhurst Rd (West Gn), Downland Pl (Southgate W) and corner shops in Ifield Gn. Some households are much better served than others- distance to shops (and town), mobility and number of shops. Numbers vary from 8 food, 1 take-away, 11 nonfood shops in Tilgate to 2,1 and 4 in West Gn. Planners encourage convenience shops but a few specialist ones serve a wider market on a cheaper site than in town. C.B.D. shops offer the same chain stores as elsewhere including department stores.
